post: Calling all patriotic tea drinkers! The Bill of Rights Institute is proud to partner with companies like Star Spangled Tea. Star Spangled Tea offers signature American tea blends from a veteran-owned business. Specializing in an assortment of artisanal teas expertly sourced and regionally inspired by the great U. S. A. Interested in purchasing your favorite tea? Visit  https://lnkd.in/ejp4n_h7 and use code ‘BRI1791' at checkout.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #Tea

Have you seen our YouTube channel? The Bill of Rights Institute believes primary sources are essential for teaching civics and history. And when teachers and students analyze primary sources, we ensure they have the support they need. Visit  https://lnkd.in/eAJwbNwh to see all of the video resources we have available on our YouTube channel. Check out our Scholar Talks, Primary Source Essentials, Homework Help Series, and more!  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #YouTube

Education helped Retired U. S. Army Major Gerald Gangaram rise from challenging circumstances to become a decorated combat pilot and sought-after speaker all across the United States. Now, Gangaram wants to make sure all students have access to the same life-changing educational opportunities. The Bill of Rights Institute announced today that Gangaram has joined the Institute as Vice President, Civic Leadership Development. In his role, Gangaram will work with leaders in the corporate, military, and community sectors to rally support for robust civic and history education. Read the article below to learn more.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #civicseducation

The Bill of Rights Institute is celebrating 25 years of supporting educators and students. What has driven BRI for the past 25 years? What makes BRI unique? President and CEO David J. Bobb, Ph. D., answers these questions and more in the video, here  https://lnkd.in/gF2H7NDH. Interested in staying up-to-date on all things BRI? By subscribing to our Development Department newsletter, we'll bring you the latest news and information on how you can support our mission. Join here,  https://lnkd.in/ghYSQ2Cn.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #Anniversary

We would like to thank Cool School Folder for their generous donation to the Bill of Rights Institute. Thousands of students in Nebraska will now have pocket constitutions thanks to Mardra Sikora and Cool School Folder. The Cool School Folder Company specializes in providing schools with top-quality, custom pocket folders designed to enhance communication and school spirit. To learn more about Cool School Folder, visit  https://lnkd.in/ebeQF5TV To learn how you can support Power of the Printed Word, visit  https://lnkd.in/eE-zWeup  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #poweroftheprintedword

Students can begin submitting applications next month for the 2024-25 MyImpact Challenge from the Bill of Rights Institute. But did you know MyImpact Challenge is available as a resource to you all year round? BRIs MyImpact Challenge curriculum helps students hone their citizenship skills by providing a robust understanding of the role of the citizen in civil society and exploring the pillars of citizenshipentrepreneurship, charity, and government. To learn more, visit  https://lnkd.in/g9VGiH29.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #MyImpactChallenge

Americas civics teachers are essential for helping students learn about our country, our government, and their rights and responsibilities as citizens. Now, 10 of the nations top middle school and high school civics teachers have been selected as finalists for the 2024-2025 Bill of Rights Institute National Civics Teacher of the Year Award. The National Civics Teacher of the Year finalists were chosen after a nationwide search that encouraged educators, students, parents, and community members to nominate outstanding civics teachers for consideration. SmartPass, a leading provider of digital hall pass technology used by thousands of schools nationwide to increase student accountability and foster better outcomes, is joining the Bill of Rights Institute to help sponsor this years awards. Read more about this year's finalists, here  https://lnkd.in/etGf-szs.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #NationalCivicsTeacheroftheYear

Summer's not over yet! Book your end of summer travel today! BRI has partnered with TravelingToGive, a smart trip-planning tool that gives back to teachers and students. By using our travel booking tool, you can make a direct impact on civic education. Visit the link and plan your trip now. Every trip you take gives back to BRI!  https://lnkd.in/eNRSQW2C.  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #Travel

We would like to thank Salem One for their generous donation to the Bill of Rights Institute. Salem One, Inc. provides printing services. The Company offers direct mail and marketing, packaging, commercial printing, and fulfillment and inventory management. We are grateful for Salem One's donation of 15,000 pocket constitutions to teachers and students in North and South Carolina. To learn more about Salem One, visit  https://salem-one.com/ To learn how you can support Power of the Printed Word, visit  https://lnkd.in/eE-zWeup  #BillofRightsInstitute  #BRI  #PowerofthePrintedWord
